ygData.subject: Re: exploitable quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe. Yeah, it s called the kiting quest and it goes like this: find a red mob, any red mob, hit it with a DOT and then run around on those tiny SoW-powered
ygData.messageBody:
hehe. Yeah, it's called the kiting quest and it goes like this: find a
red mob, any red mob, hit it with a DOT and then run around on those
tiny SoW-powered legs until it drops dead.
Fozz

Moe Drippins wrote:
>
> From: Moe Drippins <ug@...>
>
> On vallon zek, I was amazed at the hobbit druids who leveled so
> quickly. I was told that there was some sort of quest which gives
> INSANE experience and that it was being heavily exploited.
>
> Anyone know what this is? I may want to try a stuntie, and any leg up
> is sure a good thing.
